content.rendered:
Students entering the University of La Verne under the Fall 2015 catalog and later must complete La Verne’s General Education requirements in order to earn a bachelor’s degree. General Education is comprised of three components: Critical Skills, Areas of Knowledge, and the La Verne Experience.

To learn more about specific requirements, please download the Degree Checklist.

To learn more about specific requirements, please download the Degree Checklist.
